message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $14,000 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $12,500 for the product.
